channel.title: When owner of a server, don't do this
channel.description: I was testing some commands out :ban :mute :unmute on a 728 server, all seemed to work fine. decided to try to add kick and that also worked, then i ripped off ipbann, i was excited first ipban ive had on a server, but how am i sure it works? i must try it!... and i did on myself... now i am ipbanned from my own server.... -.-

item.title: When owner of a server, don't do this
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Not a discussion topic, common sense.

Read full topic

oorr my other way…

happy leaching…

item.title: When owner of a server, don't do this
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:3, topic:463118”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=566437.msg4118777#msg4118777 date=1349435487]

I was testing some commands out :ban :mute :unmute on a 728 server, all seemed to work fine. decided to try to add kick and that also worked, then i ripped off ipmute, i was excited firt ipmute ive had on a server, but how am i sure it works? i must try it!.. and i did on myself… now i am ipmuted from my own server… -.-

You’re completely retarded. Ipban writes to a flat file usually, just remove your ip from it.
[/quote]

its a 728 server dude, all the files are encrypted with b2zip, the only program i found to read the files is for a mac computer. my vps is windows.
Also, don’t post it in general discussion.[/quote]

Oh dear lord just delete the file.

Read full topic
item.source: When owner of a server, don't do this

[/quote]

its a 728 server dude, all the files are encrypted with b2zip, the only program i found to read the files is for a mac computer. my vps is windows.
Also, don’t post it in general discussion.

item.title: When owner of a server, don't do this
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Taharahora:

I was testing some commands out :ban :mute :unmute on a 728 server, all seemed to work fine. decided to try to add kick and that also worked, then i ripped off ipmute, i was excited firt ipmute ive had on a server, but how am i sure it works? i must try it!.. and i did on myself… now i am ipmuted from my own server… -.-

You’re completely retarded. Ipban writes to a flat file usually, just remove your ip from it.

Also, don’t post it in general discussion.
